name: Monster Truck Driving: Extreme Tracks Climb Racing
name_original: Monster Truck Driving: Extreme Tracks Climb Racing
description:
Do you love truck racing games? then you will really love this monster truck driving.
Drive your monster truck through amazing track like hill,jumps,up and down in this simple and fun physics-based racing game. Extreme ramps and crazy environment waiting for you in this truck driving games.

• 10 different amazing tracks
• Simple and smooth control
• cool truck to complete challenging levels
• HD quality graphics
• super accurate physics with 3D environment
• Extreme hills and ramps
